title: Rise og Sivagami
description: Fantastic story told in an amazing way. Throughout the reading we will feel all the emotions of Sivagami. One of the best books I have read. ...

title: ROle of the Dice
description: Right from calling Duryodhana as Suyodhana and Dusshasana becoming Sushasana a clever change from ‘dur’ (negative) to ‘su’ (positive) to giving a voice to the unsung heroes of the greatest epic from India Anand Neelakantan has aptly made all his readers see the other side of the story in his book ‘Ajaya – Epic of the Kaurava Clan’.
